text:
All of them look delicious...!
Um, um...! I'll go with this one!

Oh, perfect timing.
We just received some chocolates as a gift.

Producer-san, which one will you choose?
Please feel free to pick your favorite chocolate!
Then, I'll go with the heart-shaped one.
I think I'll go with the round one.

!
We're choosing the same one! Look!

That one looks delicious, doesn't it?
I'll take one more... oh, here it is.
Can I have one of these chocolates too?
The star-shaped one is highly recommended!
